note.p: Buried: St Giles' cemetery, now Ascension Cemetery, Cambridge

Education: Career: Fellow of Trinity College Cambridge (1879-1941); Chair of Social Anthropology at University of Liverpool (1907); original Fellow of the British Academy; Associate Member of the Institute of France; Commander fo the Legion d'honneur;
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 897-914, plate, by H J Fleure
